ygData.subject: Re: Leatherskin spell
ygData.msgSnippet: ... No no. Your first spell, sheildskin absorbs 100 dmg. Leatherskin, I would guess, 150-200. -- Sergey
ygData.messageBody:
Aura Dracul wrote:
>
> From: "Aura Dracul" <auradracul@...>
>
> Definately Buy it...
>
> then you will love seeing:
>
> A Skeletal Monk tries to bash you but your magcal Skin absorbs the blow
> A Ghoul tries to Bash you but your magical Skin absorbs the blow
> A Ghoul tries to Hit you but your magical Skin absorbs the blow
>
> Just keep in mind that the harder the hit the less it lasts!
> IE: A green MoB can hit you about 50 times for 1 point of damage per hit.
> But a Skeletal monk will take mabe 3 or 4 hits. As I recall it will absorb
> about 50 points of damage before it goes away. and it goes up as you level.
>

No no. Your first spell, sheildskin absorbs 100 dmg. Leatherskin, I
would guess, 150-200.

--
Sergey
